text: Regarding this post, <https://www.HubSpot.com/product-updates/control-file-visibility-in-the-file-manager> will we be able to attach files to contacts with limited visibility via the API?

Hi guys! I have some feedback on the *`POST /crm/v3/timeline/events`* endpoint.
I just discovered you can't include spaces in your `id` or your client will receive a 500 response with no body.
The timeline event will still get created, and if you look in your monitoring api page: <https://app.HubSpot.com/developer/:dev_id/application/:app_id/monitoring/api>
the calls show up as `201` not `500`.
